title: Bug with name of ward skin shard
body:
Today I got a ward skin shard when I opened a chest. The ward looks like a harp with a heart on it. Instead of the saying the name of the ward skin, it says:

**loot_name_ward_skin_rental_54

replies.body: The issue should now be resolved. Can you confirm whether this is the case for you?
Yes, it's now showing "Heartseeker Ward" as the name. Thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=MrNazraq,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=P18RiTOj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-17T07:09:13.269+0000)
>
> Yes, it's now showing "Heartseeker Ward" as the name. Thanks!

Great to hear :) Enjoy!
Looks like you've run into a debug string (oops!). We're aware of this occurring with several ward skins and are working on a fix!
